subject: Delivery city modification on Order #SSN1896
description_text:
Dear Support,

I would like to request that you change the city in the delivery address.
The correct city is “Iklad” and not “Budapest”. All other details are
correct

I probably accidentally recorded the data incorrectly, I apologize for the
inconvenience.

Thank you in advance for your help!

Best Regards,

Sandor Csucs

conversations.body_text: Hi Sándor Csúcs,    Don't worry, we've changed it for you.
